title: Assignment 1 inquiry
body: Good Evening, I just wanted to ask when will the assignment grade be posted?

title: Project
body: Professor can we get feedback on phase 1 please ?

title: Office hour timings
body: Tomorrow there shall be an office hour at 12noon.

title: Office Hours
body: Professor could you please open another time slot for office hours?

title: Project
body: The project was so fun to work on. However i think our team would rather more time.

title: Chapter 4
body: Can we get extra practice materials for chapter 4?

title: Project
body: This will be noted for next time.

title: Project feedback
body: you will receive your grades and feedback during lab next week inshallah

title: office hours
body: yes, the new slots will be added starting next week

title: chapter 4 materials
body: new practice papers had been added

title: office hours
body: Great Work! I advice students to make great use of their instructors office hours!

title: Appreciation
body: Great work everyone!! Do not hesitate to reach out when in need for help. my door is open.

title: appreciation
body: great work ahmad! always show an initiative!!

title: Too Many Deadlines
body: I feel like 2 homework assessments due only 1 week apart is a lot, could we get an extension for hw 2?

title: Will look into it
body: I understand Alya, thanks for your comment. I will check with the coordinator of the course and see what I can do.
